name: Tantei Jing?ji Sabur?: Yume no Owari ni
description:
Tantei Jing?ji Sabur?: Yume no Owari ni (literally translated as Detective Jing?ji Sabur?: To the End of Dream) is the 6th entry in the Jake Hunter series.

In this game, Jing?ji is tormented by hideous dreams of his past in New York. One day, he helped Nagata Yuka, a high-school friend of his assistant Y?ko Misono, to solve the stalker problem. After he thought that he had already solved this case successfully, Nagata vanished. At the same time, a series of women missing cases were happening.
alsoFor: PlayStation 3, PSP, PS Vita, SEGA Saturn | Combined View
